title: Pair of Leg Wraps
description: long black wraps with 1 1/2\" magenta embroidery extinding to within 8\" of end on a) and to within 10\" of end on b); bottom edge selvedge; orange and black striped tape tie on each
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
